channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoho -- ManageEngine ServiceDesk
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoho -- ManageEngine ServiceDesk

item.title: CVE-2017-11512|2024-09-16T17:02:50.915Z -- zoho -- manageengine%20servicedesk
item.description: The ManageEngine ServiceDesk 9.3.9328 is vulnerable to arbitrary file downloads due to improper restrictions of the pathname used in the name parameter for the download-snapshot URL. An unauthenticated remote attacker can use this vulnerability to download arbitrary files.
